ただ待つことしかできなかった
google_translated:
I'm over that of that gate
I just could only wait

en_text: Just wait there, and wait there...
jp_text: ただただ 待って 待って…
google_translated: Just wait for you ...

en_text:
Meanwhile, my body grew
bigger, little by little.
jp_text:
そのうち
少しずつ体は大きくなって
google_translated:
In the meantime
The body is slightly bigger

en_text:
That fool came to leave his
arm and leg at the doorway,
jp_text:
そのバカは 門のこっちに
脚と手を置きに来た
google_translated:
The fool is here
I came to put her leg with her legs

en_text:
shouting for his brother
to be returned to him.
jp_text: “弟を返してくれ”とか叫んで…
google_translated: "Return my brother" or shouting ...

en_text: And so, I took that arm and leg.
jp_text:
だからさあ
その手足 僕が もらったんだ
google_translated:
So
That hand and foot I got she got

en_text:
And then, after another long
while, I opened the door.
jp_text:
そして また 長い時間をかけて
僕は門を開けた
google_translated:
And over a long time
I opened the gate

en_text: I had finally come out of there!
jp_text: やっと… 出てきたんだ
google_translated: Finally ... I came out

en_text: It's not true...
jp_text: うそだ…
google_translated: it's a lie…

en_text: Thank you for the arm and leg.
jp_text: 手と脚を ありがとう
google_translated: Thank you for your hands and legs

en_text: Thank you for the incomplete life.
jp_text: 出来損ないの命を ありがとう
google_translated: Thank you for your life

en_text:
I'm so thankful, that no matter how much
I might hate you, it's still not enough.
jp_text:
どんなに憎んでも
憎み足りないぐらい感謝しているよ
google_translated:
No matter how hate
Thank you very much for being hated

en_text: Now, give me all of your body!
jp_text: 君の体 全部くれ
google_translated: You're all of you

en_text: Then, I will become human!
jp_text: それで 僕は 人間になる！
google_translated: So I become a human being!

en_text:
Brother, if you're not
going to fight, then I will!
jp_text: 兄さんがやらないなら 僕がやる
google_translated: If my brother does not do it, I will do

en_text:
Still, this boy's right arm
and left leg belong to Brother!
jp_text:
この子の右手と左脚は
兄さんのものだ
google_translated:
The right hand of this child and the left leg
It is an older brother

en_text: He lost them for my sake!
jp_text: 僕のために失った…
google_translated: I lost for me ...

en_text: Al...
jp_text: アル…
google_translated: Al ...

en_text: ...is to get them back!
jp_text: それを取り返すために 僕たちは…
google_translated: We are ... to get it back ...

en_text: Episode 32: ''Dante of the Deep Woods''
jp_text: 第32話「深い森のダンテ」
google_translated: Episode 32 "Deep Forest Dante"

en_text: Greed--aIso known as the Mightiest ShieId.
jp_text: グリード　またの名を最強の盾
google_translated: Greed or the strongest shield
